column1:
share on x jb jack bailey. jun 21 at 10:52 am one of my best friends in high school (webb), wonderful musician and journalist, and fun fellow to be with. so very sorry to lose him. jack bailey, webb '72. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jg jeanie sorrells garrell. jun 21 at 7:17 am chris hired me to work at the times-gazette for two summers when i was in college. those are some of my best memories during my college years. he was funny, helpful and encouraging. i am so sorry for your great loss. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x cg cliff and linda garrard. jun 21 at 6:20 am may this time of great grief be a time of great grace for you and your family and friends. how we will miss him! please know you are in our thoughts and our prayers. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe feldhaus memorial chapel website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of mr. chris shofner send comfort to the shofner family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! wj wilson sims jr. jun 21 at 11:42 am chris was a fellow classmate at webb and a member of the class of '72. we treasure our memories and times with him. please know our prayers and condolences are with the shofner family at this time. comment share comment share facebook twitter
